entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
